abstract: Film production outfit Dolphin Entertainment has secured more than $100 million in financing from Citigroup affiliate Continental Entertainment Capital, to fund six movies targeted at adolescents.
lead_paragraph: Film production outfit Dolphin Entertainment has secured more than $100 million in financing from Citigroup affiliate Continental Entertainment Capital, to fund six movies targeted at adolescents.

headline.main: Dolphin Entertainmanet Swims Off With Film Financing
